org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.reports.designer

Class ReportOptionProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.reports.designer.ReportOptionProvider

  • public class ReportOptionProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    Enumerate all options of report designer depending on report profile (tab/report), report type and team member access type
